Alexander Emerick Jones (amuru Febụwarị 11, 1974) bụ onye America n'akụkụ aka nri na alt-right onye nnabata redio na onye ama ama[lower-alpha 1] na-agba izu.  Ọ na-akwado The Alex Jones Show si Austin, Texas, nke Genesis Communications Network na-agbasa  gafee United States (syndicated na ịntanetị redio).  Webụsaịtị Jones, InfoWars, na-akwalite echiche izu nzuzo na akụkọ adịgboroja,    dị ka webụsaịtị ya ndị ọzọ NewsWars na PrisonPlanet na-eme.  Jones enyela ikpo okwu na nkwado maka ndị na-acha ọcha mba, na-enye Unite the Right attender and White Supremacist Nick Fuentes ikpo okwu na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ya Banned.Video, yana ije ozi dị ka "ihe ntinye" na echiche ha.
